claim: Mithun Chakraborty is a silent film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gourang Chakraborty  (  born 16 June 1950  )  , better known by his stage name Mithun Chakraborty ; informally referred to as Mithun Da , is an Indian film actor , singer , producer , writer , social worker , entrepreneur and a Rajya Sabha Member of Parliament .
